Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 10.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
71.
1260Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho…pe…  naadhipatipaccayā (sahajātasadisaṃ)…  napurejātapaccayā…  napacchājātapaccayā, naāsevanapaccayā…  nakammapaccayā…  satta, navipākapaccayā…  najhānapaccayā…  namaggapaccayā…  navippayuttapaccayā… .
<< Nahetuup10.5.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
